class_notes: Registration for this class is only for students in the Transactional Certificate Program. Non-certificate students can try to enroll during Open Enrollment, if there are open seats.
course_description: This course will study the business and legal issues in venture capital transactions. The course will be taught primarily through simulations.
prerequisites: Business Associations, Contract Drafting, and Deal Skills are pre-requisites for this course. If you have not satisfied all courses, then you are not eligible to enroll at this time. Please contact Kelli.Pittman@emory.edu with all inquiries.
